page.title: 03SUTTON VENY VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: The village school has four classes with four teachers including the head teacher.The age ranges from five to eleven and there are about 94 children in the school.Half of them come in by bus from other villages.We are loosing one of our teachers because of govern- ment savings on schools. Playtime is the best time of the day because when it is quite dry we are allowed on the big field which is a part of our school.We have an adven- ture playground but we are not allowed on it in school time.P.E.is also a good time of the day and we sometimes do country dancing. We have assembly on every day except Monday and use the church next to our school at the end of term and at Christmas time.
